title: His Christmas Wish
description: There's no time like the Present...War Hero, Joaquin Morales, returns to Holland Springs after years of estrangement from his family...and his wife. His new mission: To convince his wife that they have a Future together.Falling in love with her husband for the second time was *not* a part of Sage Caswell's plans for the Holiday Season. She's convinced that what they had belongs in the Past.With the help of a little Christmas magic (and a well-timed snowstorm), can Joaquin and Sage's dreams come true?
author: Marquita Valentine
